title: TapasMe debuts in Hyderabad: A fusion of Euro-Asian flavours and culture
description: Hyderabad's culinary scene has been enhanced with the opening of TapasMe, a new restaurant and cocktail bar by Nocturnal Network. Located at Skyview 10 in Hi-Tech City, TapasMe offers craft cocktails, gourmet tapas blending European and Asian flavors, and a stylish ambiance. It aims to redefine the city's hospitality scene.
